snippet.title: Type 'n Jump - Ludum Dare 41
snippet.description:
Type ‘n Jump is an text-based platformer, made for Ludum Dare 41 (Combine 2 Incompatible Genres​).

Play it for FREE here:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/type-n-jump
https://the-jucas.itch.io/type-n-jump

HOW TO PLAY:
Just type the commands to control the robot.

RIGHT
LEFT
JUMP
STOP
FIRE
HELP

Credits
Design by Richard Nunes da Silva​ (www.richardnsilva.com)

Code by Eduardo Scheffler​ (https://www.linkedin.com/in/eduscheffler/)

Tools:

Engine: Unity
Graphics: Adobe Suite
Sounds: Bfxr
Music: Figure
